title: Level 27 account got reset to level 1
body:
I have an account that used to be named "Fr0mRussiaWith" in which I reached level 27, purchased champions on, played ranked , etc.. I just recently got back into the game and when I reset the password and logged into the game, it asked me to choose a new summoner name. Upon choosing a new summoner name "Soo cloze" it brought me to the main screen and I am now a level 1 with no champion purchases, rune pages, or masteries. 
Created an account on 04/06/2011. There is also proof of buying RP. And proof created accont. All my mail! 
Please HELP guys ! 
https://eune.op.gg/summoner/userName=fr0mRussiaWith ( 
Last time he played in 2012 or 2013)
My problem is identical https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/GgIxjX4q-level-30-account-got-reset-to-level-1
Support #31534874

replies.body: I am having the same problem too.. My acc is lvl 32 but somehow when i logged in i became lvl 1 with nothing at all. Still unsure of what to do..
These two accounts are actually 2 completely separate accounts entirely. The first one wasn't reset, but it was in fact transferred out of EUNE to EUW.

Yes! I realized that I was mistaken for one letter in the login. Recovered the password!
But now he writes to me: "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, contact Player Support" But where do I move, and most importantly, why?" After all, all my friends are playing at the EU NE. And is it normal that this message is written for more than one day?
If you weren't the one who transferred that account, let those agents know in your ticket and they'll be able to help you get that straightened out.
he just said where you move. i don't know why this happened
How can you play ranked with a lvl 27 lol
I very bad player. But i play only my friends in custom game.
this isn't what i said. the game doens't let you play ranked until you reach lvl 30
I don't know if Im right but if you played in past (2011 or so) every account has been reset to lvl 1. Correct me if I'm wrong.

I played a year or a year and a half (until the end of 2012). My friend started playing with me, but he's fine with the account. All the runes and characters on the site, not to mention the name of the account and the level.
